level.heading: HUMAN CARE AGREEMENTS UNDER THE TEMPORARY ASSISTANCE TO NEEDY FAMILIES (TANF)ROGRAM (§ 27-1909)

level.text: 1909.1 The Director sets the prices established in § 1614.1(c) of this title,o be paid to contractors selected through the human care procurement method for services provided under the District’s Temporary Assistance to Needy Families (TANF) Program, implementing the Self-sufficiency Promotion Amendment Act of 1998 (D.C. Law 12-241).

level.heading: SOURCE
level.text: Final Rulemaking published at 35 DCR 1492 (February 26, 1988); asmended by Emergency and Proposed rulemaking published at 47 DCR 8590 (October0, 2000) [EXPIRED]; as amended by Final Rulemaking published at 48 DCR 5819June 22, 2001); as amended by Notice of Emergency and Proposed Rulemakingublished at 58 DCR 5199, 5209 (June 17, 2011)[EXPIRED]; as amended by Notice ofinal Rulemaking published at 58 DCR 6411, 6421 (July 29, 2011).
